snippet: The automaker has tightened the front and rear portions of its Z car for the 2013 model year.
abstract: The automaker has tightened the front and rear portions of its Z car for the 2013 model year.
lead_paragraph: Nissan introduced the mildly refreshed 2013 370Z on Tuesday, a day before its public debut at the Chicago auto show. The sports car, which has undergone few changes since its introduction as a 2009 model, is the sixth generation of Nissan's Z line, which was ushered in by the 240Z of 1970.

headline.main: Nissan Unveils Mildly Refreshed 370Z Ahead of Debut at Chicago Auto Show
